FileFormat.FormatDescription: Maxwell Render is a 3D render engine developed by Next Limit Technologies. The Material file defines material properties for 3D objects for use within a Maxwell 3D Scene.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The Canadian Centre for Architecture / The Canadian Centre for Architecture

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: 'MXM' {5-64} 0x000000. It may be possible to enhance this signature and to distinguish between different versions. Please contact the PRONOM team if you can assist with this.
